name: Robotics Running Low
description:
Rogue like game, where you play a robot trying to survive while your health is draining. You gain upgrades after levels and then you get to fight the boss.

Game was created as part of TiTeJam, that was hosted by IGDAKotka, a part of IGDAFinland.

Controls: Right analog / WASD = move, Left analog / Arrow keys = shoot.

RB / N = Changes song, A stars the game in menu.

Team: Heikki Väyrynen
